menu.name: Caribbean Rice
menu.description: Fragrant spiced rice with coconut milk and herbs, passed down from someone dear.

menu.description: Savory pancakes stuffed with spicy chicken — a nostalgic comfort food.

menu.description: Anime-favorite ramen with seasoned broth, boiled egg, and Naruto fishcake.

menu.name: Luffy's Meat Feast
menu.description: Grilled meat combo with Caribbean sauces, perfect for a pirate’s appetite!

menu.description: Juicy chicken wrapped with anime spice blend and Nigerian hot sauce.

menu.description: Mild Japanese-style curry with vegetables — comforting and flavorful.

menu.description: Fried sweet plantain and chicken skewers with anime-style dip.

menu.name: Sakura Mango Smoothie
menu.description: Chilled tropical mango smoothie with a cherry blossom twist.

menu.description: Grilled chicken with coconut cream and anime herbs.
